articles.title: Monkeypox Cases Triple in Europe, WHO Says; Africa Concerned - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: More than 5,000 monkeypox cases have been reported from 51 countries that don’t normally have it
articles.content: LONDON  The World Health Organization's Europe chief warned Friday that monkeypox cases in the region have tripled in the past two weeks and urged countries to do more to ensure the previously rare d… [+5187 chars]

articles.author: Carrington Clarke, Rebecca Armitage
articles.title: John Roberts is the chief justice of the US Supreme Court. But the fall of Roe v Wade and abortion rights have left him 'weakened' - ABC News
articles.description: As Chief Justice of the US Supreme Court, John Roberts has enjoyed one of the most powerful positions in American society. But when Donald Trump installed three of his own picks on the bench, suddenly everything changed.
articles.content: When the US Supreme Court rocked America by toppling the constitutional right to an abortion, it seemed like the conservative super-majority on the bench had never been more powerful or more united. … [+12225 chars]

articles.title: Trial for US basketball star Brittney Griner begins in Moscow-area court - CBC Sports
articles.description: American basketball star Brittney Griner went on trial Friday, four and a half months after her arrest on charges of possessing cannabis oil while returning to play for a Russian team, in a case that unfolded amid tense relations between Moscow and Washington.
